+@name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

info.+content: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt
Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime
关于我转生变成史莱姆这档事
転生したらスライムだった件

Satoru Mikami's life was pretty ordinary: at age 37, he was coasting along with a decent job but no girlfriend. That all changed when he was stabbed to death in broad daylight, and his final thoughts were translated into special abilities in his next life. Reborn in a fantasy world, Satoru now has a wide variety of skills and powers available to him, but the downside is that he's no longer human. Instead, he's become a blue slime monster, and is alone in a cave full of magical plants and minerals, or so he thinks until he runs into a giant dragon named Verudora. Satoru and Verudora soon become friends, but there's a violent world waiting for them outside the cave.
#2: "Little Soldier" (リトルソルジャー) by Azusa Tadokoro
転生したらスライムだった件
